item.title: CVE-2019-1010206|2024-08-05T03:07:18.395Z -- oss -- http%20request%20%28apache%20cordova%20plugin%29
item.description: OSS Http Request (Apache Cordova Plugin) 6 is affected by: Missing SSL certificate validation. The impact is: certificate spoofing. The component is: use this library when https communication. The attack vector is: certificate spoofing.
